name: Pipe It Puzzle Challenge
description:
Pipe It is a new puzzle game designed by Tetris author Alexey Pajitnov. It is a modern take on classic game mechanics.

Put all puzzle pieces from lower shelf onto the playing field. Build the branches by connecting all the pipes of the same color.

Pipe It offers:
• 2 different game modes PIPE IT and SPIN IT;
• 1800 puzzles in 6+6 packs of growing difficulty;
• Golden puzzle pack crafted by Tetris author Alexey Pajitnov;
• 5+5 new puzzle challenges every day;
• Hint system to assist you;
• Stylish visuals and sound effects.

Go higher with unique Pipe It features:
• Puzzle boards of hundred different sizes and shapes;
• Up to 7 different pipe colors on a playing field;
• Composite puzzle pieces;
• Empty, colored and color adjusting pipes.

Pipe up with your brain playing new puzzle game from Tetris creator!
